title.rendered: Ambassador Yusuf M. Tuggar (OON) received in audience H.E Mersole J. Mellejor

content.rendered: The Honourable Minister of Foreign Affairs, Ambassador Yusuf M. Tuggar (OON) received in audience H.E Mersole J. Mellejor, Ambassador of the Republic of the Philippines to Nigeria today 16th July, 2024. Discussed bilateral matters which included hosting the 4th Philippines – Nigeria Joint Commission, Visa waivers for diplomatic and official passports holders and collaboration between companies from Nigeria and Philippines regarding Nigeria’s agricultural landscape.
